description: Submit a search for a given workspace. The response will contain an id to track the search. User can use the id to poll the search status and get the full search result later if the search takes long time to finish.

start.description: The start date filter, so the only query results returned are after this date.

end.description: The end date filter, so the only query results returned are before this date.

parameters.description: The parameters required to execute a search query.

top.description: The number to get from the top.

highlight.description: The highlight that looks for all occurrences of a string.
